Include file 'navbar.html nav=site.data.navbar' contains invalid characters or sequences

Open source file format identification, validation & characterisation

Download JHOVE

Currently v1.12.beta

Software

JHOVE is implemented as a Java application. JHOVE should be usable on any Unix, Windows, or OS X platform with an appropriate Java installation.

The JHOVE supports two user interfaces:

  1. A command-line interface
  2. A Swing-based GUI interface

Getting started

There is a gettting started guide on this site.
